title: The Gods must be crazy I and II
description:
The Gods must be crazy I and II

This comedy from the 80ties enables us to look at our so called &#039;civilized world&#039; from a totally different perspective. Through the eyes of a bushman from the deep African Kalahari Desert.

Part 1:
Xixi finds a coca cola bottle and asumes it is a gift from the Gods. However, because there is only one bottle in the tribe, it soon becomes the centre of envy, arguments and fights. Xixi concludes that the thing must be evil and decides to go to the edge of the world, to throw it back to the Gods.

Part 2:
2 children of Xixi end up in a poachers truck. Xixi follows it to rescue his kids. Along the road he meets several &#039;heavy people&#039; (because white people are a lot taller than him) The heavy people must be very dumb. They rely on their magic devices but can&#039;t survive without them. He has to save them over and over again.

Both movies are excellent quality DVD-rips. Each movie fits on 1 cd.
Dutch subtitles are included in the mkv-container (not streamed in the movie)
Video-codec: x264
Audio-codec: ac3

A nice comedy for the whole family, with a deeper message embedded.

Enjoy!
